availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Pulford (Louisville, Kentucky, peddler, confectioner, and clerk)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, peddler, confectioner, and clerk. Native of Germany. Son of Catherine Pulford. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Peddler in Louisville in 1860. Confectioner for Mears & Company in Louisville in 1860. Served in Atkinson's Company of the Kentucky Home Guards as third corporal in Louisville in 1861. Clerk for the Adams Express Company in Louisville in 1865.
